question_text: What is the best alternative explanation you can think of that could lead to the same set of evidence?
answer_text: The results are simply due to chance, as well as confirmation bias. In actuality, there is no causal link between marijuana use and harm to brain development, and the authors of the article only chose evidence that would support this causal link.
